Factsheet

Alexander Van den Bulck

Full Release: EUR 5.89

Description

A fusion of tower defense games and roguelike deckbuilders. Use your cards to build towers and to upgrade them in unique ways. Gain rewards to customize your deck, defense and playstyle. Break the shapes before they break you!

History

Alexander is a big fan of both the Tower Defense genre and Roguelike Deckbuilders. The idea of combining these two genres led to the development of Shapebreaker which started in November 2021. Early prototypes of the game were very well received. This led to the game quickly moving to Itch.io, resulting in a first wave of fans and players. Alexander strongly believes that early feedback from players is essential to making a game the best it can be. An active Discord server and in-game feedback feature have proven invaluable during further development of the game. In an effort to gather even more feedback, Early Access was a clear choice for moving the development of the game forward. After 10 months of Early Access the game is now ready for full release on May 2, 2023

Features

  • Card-based defense: Play cards to build and improve towers.
  • Deckbuilding: Gain rewards to customize your deck, defense and playstyle.
  • Build unique towers: Create unique towers by combining them with different modules and elements.
  • Mazing: Enemies will try to head straight to your core, but don't let them. Choose the position of your towers wisely to create the perfect maze.
  • Unique playthroughs: Every playthrough contains distinct rewards, areas and enemies.

About Alexander Van den Bulck

Boilerplate
Alexander Van den Bulck is an indie solo developer located in Belgium. His current project is a Tower Defense Deckbuilder called Shapebreaker.
